rule.name: WAAAGH!
rule.effect: If your Army Faction is Orks, once per battle, at the start of the battle round, you can call a Waaagh! If you do, until the start of the next battle round:
select: Orks units from your army are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced.
Add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by Orks models from your army.
Orks models from your army have a 5+ invulnerable save.

detachments.name: WAAAGH! Tribe
detachments.effect: Melee weapons equipped by Orks models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

enhancements.name: Follow Me Ladz
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Headwoppa's Killchoppa
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. Melee weapons equipped by the bearer that do not have the [EXTRA ATTACKS] ability have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

enhancements.name: Kunnin' but Brutal
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

enhancements.name: Supa-Cybork Body
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.name: Careen!
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an Orks Vehicle unit from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
stratagems.target: That destroyed Orks Vehicle unit, if you roll a 6 for its Deadly Demise ability. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this move, your unit can move over enemy units (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) as if they were not there.

stratagems.name: Orks is Never Beanten
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: Unbridled Carnage
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an Orks model in your unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: 'Ard as Nails
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a Vehicle or Gretchin unit for this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: Mob Rule
stratagems.target: One Mob unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, while a friendly Orks Infantry unit is within 6" of that Mob unit, that Orks Infantry unit can still be selected as the target of your Stratagems even if it is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: 'Ere We Go
stratagems.target: One Orks Infantry unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for your unit.

data.name: Ramshackle but Rugged
data.effect: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

wargear.name: ’Ard Case
wargear.effect: Add 2 to the bearer’s Toughness characteristic, but it no longer has the Firing Deck ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Monster Hunters
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

leader.name: Beastboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Beastly Rage
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons it is equipped with have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: ’Ere We Go (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Beast Snagga unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit.

data.name: Single-minded Predator
data.effect: You can target this model with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 1CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Fix Dat Armour Up
data.effect: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

wargear.name: Kustom Force Field
wargear.effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Grot Oiler
wargear.effect: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds.

roster.name: Big Mek with Kustom Force Field
keywords: Big Mek with Kustom Force Field

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

leader.name: Kustom Force Field
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can overcharge its kustom force field. If it does, until the end of the phase, this invulnerable save is improved to 4+.

wargear.name: Grot Helper
wargear.effect: Once per battle, the bearer can overcharge its kustom force field one additional time.

roster.name: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun
keywords: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Deranged Snotling Assault
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

wargear.name: Grot Assistant
wargear.effect: Once per battle, after rolling to determine how many attacks the bearer’s shokk attack gun makes, you can re-roll that dice.

data.name: Boom Bomb
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6: on a 4+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dust Trails (Aura)
data.effect: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Red Skull Kommandos
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover.

data.name: Kunnin’ Infiltrator
data.effect: Once per battle, in your Movement phase, instead of making a Normal move with this model’s unit, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

leader.name: Drill Boss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Plummeting Descent
data.effect: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model’s unit in a turn in which it was set up on the battlefield from Reserves.

data.name: Breakin’ Heads
data.effect: While a Warboss model is leading this unit, in your Command phase, the first time a Battle-shock test is failed for this unit that phase, if it is within range of an objective marker, you can choose to break some heads. If you do, 1 Bodyguard model in this unit is destroyed and you can re-roll that test.

data.name: Pyromaniaks
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack with a burna that targets an enemy unit within 6", re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is also within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

data.name: Burna Bomb
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover. In addition, roll one D6 for each model in that unit: for each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dakkastorm
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, every successful Hit roll scores a Critical Hit.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Piston-driven Brutality
data.effect: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test.

leader.name: Speedboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: High-octane Fuel
data.effect: Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

data.name: Deff from Above
data.effect: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

data.name: Gun-crazy Show-offs
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit targets the closest eligible target with its snazzgun, until the end of the phase, that weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 4.

wargear.name: Ammo Runt
wargear.effect: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

leader.name: Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!
leader.effect: While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Ghazghkull’s Waaagh! Banner (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Orks unit is within 12" of Makari, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

data.name: Makari
data.effect: Makari has a 2+ invulnerable save, You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model.

data.name: Clankin’ Forward
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding Monster and Vehicle models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

data.name: Big an’ Stompy
data.effect: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Runtherd
data.effect: While this unit contains one or more Gretchin models, each time an attack targets this unit, Runtherd models in this unit have a Toughness characteristic of 2.

data.name: Thievin’ Scavengers
data.effect: At the start of your Command phase, roll one D6 for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it. If one or more of those rolls is a 4+, you gain 1CP.

data.name: Bail Out, Boyz!
data.effect: If this Transport is destroyed, you can re-roll the dice when determining if a disembarking model’s unit suffers mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Flashiest Gitz
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

data.name: Ded Glowy Ammo (Aura)
data.effect: While an enemy Infantry unit is within 6" of this model, subtract 1 from the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit.

data.name: Spirit of Gork (Psychic)
data.effect: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one friendly Orks unit within 12" of this model and roll one D6: on a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit; on a 6, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit and those weapons have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Shooty Power Trip
data.effect: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can roll one D6: on a 1, the nearest other friendly Orks unit within 12" of and visible to this unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

data.name: Sneaky Surprise
data.effect: Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at this unit.

wargear.name: Distraction Grot
wargear.effect: Once per battle, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, before making a saving throw for a model in this unit, it can deploy the distraction grot. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Bomb Squig
wargear.effect: Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Rivetin’ Dakka
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a rivet kannon. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dat’s Our Loot!
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

leader.name: Mad Dok
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: One Scalpel Short of a Medpack
data.effect: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Krumpin’ Time
data.effect: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: Drill Through
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Mekboy
data.effect: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Orks Vehicle units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

data.name: Mekaniak
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly Orks Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that Vehicle model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

data.name: Splat!
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit containing 10 or more models, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Clankin’ Forward
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding Monster and Vehicle models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

data.name: Big an’ Shooty
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack during the battle round in which you called a Waaagh!, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Da Bigger Dey iz…
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack. Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Titanic unit, add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that attack instead.

data.name: Hungry Chompa
data.effect: Each time this model declares a charge, until the end of the turn, each time this model makes an attack, an unmodified successful Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

leader.name: Hogboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Hunt Them Down
data.effect: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, this model’s big choppa has the [ANTI-MONSTER 3+] and [ANTI-VEHICLE 3+] abilities.

data.name: Plant the Waaagh! Banner
data.effect: Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of the next battle round, this model’s unit gains the benefits of the Waaagh! ability as if you had called a Waaagh! this battle round.

data.name: Da Boss Iz Watchin’
data.effect: While this model is gaining the benefits of the Waaagh! ability, it has a 4+ invulnerable save and an Objective Control characteristic of 5.

data.name: Da Boss’ Ladz
data.effect: While a Warboss model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Ammo Runt
wargear.effect: Once per battle for each ammo runt this unit has, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
